segments.text: I see the girl standing near her brother, looking expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, waiting for a cookie from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's being very patient, waiting for her brother to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach the cookies, and the stool looks unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mother is drying dishes, completely unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl is worried about her brother falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy, unlike the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being very cooperative, helping her brother get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught by their mother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is holding a plate, maybe to catch the cookies or cover his tracks.
segments.speaker: PAR
